xyz.fsgik.common.net.udp

接口 FsUdpHeader


  • public interface FsUdpHeader
    Represents header info of UDP datagram packet, such as address and port.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static FsUdpHeader from(java.net.DatagramPacket packet)
      Returns UDP header of which content comes from given datagram packet.
      java.net.InetAddress getAddress()
      Returns address of the datagram packet.
      java.net.InetSocketAddress getInetSocketAddress()
      Returns InetSocketAddress.
      int getPort()
      Returns port of the datagram packet.
      static FsUdpHeader of(java.net.InetSocketAddress address)
      Returns UDP header of given address.

    • 方法详细资料

      • from

        static FsUdpHeader from(java.net.DatagramPacket packet)
        Returns UDP header of which content comes from given datagram packet.
        参数:
        packet - given packet
        返回:
        UDP header

      • of

        static FsUdpHeader of(java.net.InetSocketAddress address)
        Returns UDP header of given address.
        参数:
        address - given address
        返回:
        UDP header

      • getAddress

        java.net.InetAddress getAddress()
        Returns address of the datagram packet.
        返回:
        address of the datagram packet

      • getPort

        int getPort()
        Returns port of the datagram packet.
        返回:
        port of the datagram packet

      • getInetSocketAddress

        java.net.InetSocketAddress getInetSocketAddress()
        Returns InetSocketAddress.
        返回:
        InetSocketAddress
